name: Iron Sentinel Bureau
desc: The headquarters of the infamous Iron Sentinels, Kim Quy's elite guard; Boasting superb training under Hartley's Commission, utilizing the best arms and armaments that House Celeste has to offer, the loyalty of the Sentinels is absolute. Maintained through a complex system of special perks and tax incentives, the Iron Sentinels stand high above the rest of Iron Shell's already elite forces.
